data.convo: Hi , I ’ d like to have my phone turned on , please . At what address , sir ? 345 Lincoln Avenue . Oklahoma City . O . K . Your name please ? John Smith . One moment please . Very well , Mr . Smith . I need to ask you a few questions . Very well . The interview will take about 15 minutes , and your phone will be turned on in 24 hours . Fifteen minutes ? I ’ m sorry , but I ’ ll have to call back . I need to get back to work . O . K . Mr . Smith . Thanks for calling .
